page.title: 20'FOCUS'-HOOK'S MAGAZINE
page.content: Produced by volunteers in Rotherwick and Hook a 12 page issue recently had 42 entries.Included were reports that 1st Hook Brownies gave NSPCC Â£11.50; decorated a church window for harvest and sung to the Old Folks Club.After 7 games the Football Club is unbeaten;at a Village Bazaar the Youth Club will sell cakes and Gardeners Club advises on lawns, bulbs and roses. Hook Parish Council says Reading Road's new lights are almost ready;there is a recipe for delicious Gaelic Toffee;a report about the Mothers Union and a story on Hook firm,AJJB Plastics.The Rector records 2 baptisms,1 marriage,1 funeral and writes of the Church's preparation for Christmas.Evangelical Free Church also contributes.37 local organisations are listed,dates of forthcoming events are given together with some adverts for village firms.
